question_text:
Question 51
In relational data model which is true.
(A) A relation with only two attribute is always BCNF
(B) BCNF decomposition preserve functional dependencies
(C) Every relation has at least one non prime attribute
(D) If all attributes of a relation are prince attributes, then relation is in BCNF.
explanation_text:
Sol. 
A relation with two attributes is always in BCNF.
